name: Logisim Circuit File
summary: Learn about .CIRC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Logisim is primarily used by college students in a variety of disciplines from computer organization courses to logic in general education classes. As of October 11, 2014 development of Logisim has been suspended indefinitely.

description: Circuit file created and used by Logisim, a graphical tool for designing and simulating logic circuits; contains circuit data in XML format; includes names and placement coordinates of wiring, gates, and plexers.
